anuththarada thawath ek aadaraya karana premawanthiyak wuwaya.aadaraya namathi badima hamuwe igenima namathi wagakima aya pahara harimin sitiyaya.ee bawa ayata amathaka wi thibuni.oba gahanu lamayeku nam ayata banimata ayithiyak obata kohethma natha.maknisada yath obada nodanuwathmama aadaraya hamuwe noyek wagakim amathaka kara dama aththeku bawini.
